mapper.sql: vtypeid, enginetypeid, vtypeno, vtypename, vprice, vdate, vpower, fuelmark
mapper.select: SELECT ve.*,en.enginetypename,vebr.`vbrandname` FROM `vehicletype` AS ve , `enginetype` AS en , `vehiclebrand` AS vebr WHERE ve.enginetypeid = en.enginetypeid AND vebr.`vbrandid` = ve.vbrandid

SELECT ve.*,en.enginetypename,vebr.`vbrandname` FROM `vehicletype` AS ve , `enginetype` AS en , `vehiclebrand` AS vebr WHERE ve.enginetypeid = en.enginetypeid AND vebr.`vbrandid` = ve.vbrandid AND `vtypeid` = #{vtypeid}
mapper.insert: insert into vehicletype (vtypeid, enginetypeid, vtypeno, vtypename, vprice, vdate, vpower, fuelmark) values (#{vtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enginetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vtypeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{vpower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fuelmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into vehicletype

vtypeno,

vbrandid,

mapper.update:
update vehicletype
enginetypeid = #{vehitype.enginetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vtypeno = #{vehitype.vtypeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtypename = #{vehitype.vtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vprice = #{vehitype.vprice,jdbcType=REAL},
vdate = #{vehitype.vdate,jdbcType=DATE},
vpower = #{vehitype.vpower,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fuelmark = #{vehitype.fuelmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vbrandid = #{vehitype.vbrandid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where vtypeid = #{vehitype.vtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update vehicletype set enginetypeid = #{enginetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vtypeno = #{vtypeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtypename = #{vtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vprice = #{vprice,jdbcType=REAL}, vdate = #{vdate,jdbcType=DATE}, vpower = #{vpower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fuelmark = #{fuelmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where vtypeid = #{vtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
